alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Gonzales; Guadalupe (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 27 at 5:26PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Caldwell, northeastern Guadalupe and northwestern Gonzales Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 525 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kingsbury, or 7 miles southwest of Luling, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... San Marcos, Lockhart, Luling, Martindale, Uhland, Mustang Ridge, Kingsbury, Niederwald, Staples, Fentress, Palmeto State Park, Joliet, Stairtown, San Marcos Regional Airport, Maxwell, Reedville, McNeil, Redwood, Ottine, and Mendoza. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
